description:
Raphael is a fighter from the east coast and a UFC fanatic who trains everyday. His muscular body is proof that all that boxing and mixed martial arts certainly pays off. He’s got a feisty streak that he takes out on the punching bag and his uncut cock.
I asked him what he wanted to do for a career. I expected to hear “professional boxer” or “UFC” but instead he wants to be a doctor.
Raphael has a great muscular ass and hard uncut cock, which he loved to slap around. We gave him a glass desk to drop his load onto, and he grabbed and fondled his balls until he came.
In the gym, Raphael showed us some of his skills. He’s quick and packs a mean punch!
The balance ball ended up being his favorite piece of gym equipment and he certainly put it to good use...
title: Raphael
